Linked Hosting was launched in September, 2013 after several months with planning. We founded Linked Hosting mainly for ONE reason, to make a significant change in the hosting market! We wanted to deliver high speed and quality VPS serviced for a cheap amount, that can't be find anywhere else! And i think we have succeeded with that. Our Hardware equipment is located in Ashburn and Phoenix in USA. We have Highly available 2N Power and proud to be hosting with PhoenixNAP, their end to end redundancy starts with two transformers and delivering power along divergent paths to the UPS systems. An they are one of the safest datacenter you could be able to find in US.


www.linked-hosting.com
